name: listallcountries
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool world_cities_and_countries.
Tool description: The fastest and most updated API with rich data that allow you search cities from more than 2 million records. Also allows to search country data with other additional info.
API description: Retrieves a list of all countries from the API with optional pagination and sorting.

page.description: Page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

sortby.description:
Valid format to sort is `field:order`
e.g. `name:asc`, `name:desc` for country name sorting

where `asc` for sorting in ascending order
`desc` for sorting in descending order

limit.description: Maximum number of results per page. Defaults to 200.
